metadata.name: Salatul Layl - Optional dua after 4 Nafila

arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ اَنْتَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّوْمُ، اَلْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيْمُ
وَ لَكَ الْمَنُّ وَ لَكَ الْاَمْرُ
اَسْأَلُكَ اَنْ تُصَلِّيَ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
وَ اَنْ تَرْحَمَ ذُلِّ بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ وَ تَضَرُّعِيْ اِلَيْكَ
وَحْشَتِيْ مِنَ النَّاسِ وَ اُنْسِيْ بِكَ
translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
O Allah bless Muhammad and his family
O Allah You are the Ever Living, the Eternal the Elevated, the Mighty
the Creator, the Sustainer the One who gives life and the One who causes to die
For You is nobility and for You is generosity
and for You is grace and for You is the command
You are One there is no partner for You
O the One who gives life and the One who causes to die
I ask you to bless Muhammad and his family
and to have mercy on my lowliness before You and my beseeching You
and my loneliness from people and my intimacy with You
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
al khāliqur rāziq, al muḥyil mumīt
wa lakal mannu wa lakal amr
as-aluka an tuṣalliya `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
wa an tar-ḥama dhulli bayna yadayka wa taḍarru`ī ilayk
waḥshatī minan nāsi wa unsī bik
